content.title: Aortic Dissection Definition
content.definition: Aortic dissection is separation of aortic wall layers by blood entering through an intimal tear, creating true and false lumens.
content.statement: Aortic Dissection Definition is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Pathology Aortic-Dissection that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.
